about_the_game:
In 1890, many mutated zombies appeared in abandoned munitions factories in the northern United States. Before that, it was originally a military factory preserved after the First World War, attracting many people to visit. But slowly the people around found that many girls disappeared here. This aroused the great attention of the local government and immediately sealed off the factory. And summoned five star General "McAleavy" to discuss a solution. You, as McLeaver's favorite underling, were sent to the weapons factory to investigate and retrieve the girls if they were found. Are you ready for the mission?

Game Features

■ 3A level high quality map, real shooting, scene interaction, excellent sound and so on.

■ Multiple weapons, sniper, pistol, shotgun, submachine gun, etc.

■ Multi-story mission, with the task step by step, and finally rescue all the girls.

Game Play

■ WSAD controls movement,R change, left mouse button shooting,SHIFT acceleration,T injection,G grenade.

■ There are many supply packs in the game, you can replenish ammunition, medical packs, etc.

content_descriptors.notes: Female zombies in the game wear underwear. Shooting female zombies will have a blood rush effect.

detailed_description:
In 1890, many mutated zombies appeared in abandoned munitions factories in the northern United States. Before that, it was originally a military factory preserved after the First World War, attracting many people to visit. But slowly the people around found that many girls disappeared here. This aroused the great attention of the local government and immediately sealed off the factory. And summoned five star General "McAleavy" to discuss a solution. You, as McLeaver's favorite underling, were sent to the weapons factory to investigate and retrieve the girls if they were found. Are you ready for the mission?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: win7,8,10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-11600K
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX2050
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: win10
  • Processor: Intel i5-12500H
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX4060
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Take up arms to drive away the mutated zombies and save the beautiful girls!
supported_languages: English, French, German, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
